text: Offensive sexual comments made to me by a colleague in the office corridor.
My manager sent an explicit photo in a work group chat without consent.
A coworker repeatedly asked me out despite saying no several times.
Someone touched my shoulder and back in a way that made me uncomfortable at work.
I received unwanted sexually suggestive messages from a team member via company email.
The team lead made derogatory jokes about my body and appearance.
I was pressured for a date in exchange for a promotion by a senior employee.
Colleague blocked my exit and made uncomfortable physical advances.
Explicit sexual content was shown on a shared work station screen without my permission.
A coworker kept staring and leering at me in the workplace.
Someone sent persistent unsolicited messages on WhatsApp about personal life.
The office supervisor made sexually suggestive comments in a meeting.
I was asked inappropriate questions about my relationship status by peers.
Someone repeatedly brushed past me in a way that felt intentional and unwelcome.
My boss sent sexual emoticons and inappropriate remarks on Slack.
An employee made offensive remarks about women in general during work hours.
During a team lunch, a colleague attempted to put an arm around me uninvited.
A coworker showed me sexually explicit images from their phone at desk.
I was criticized and humiliated in front of colleagues for refusing advances.
Someone made gender-based demeaning remarks creating a hostile environment.
